video_prompt: Cyberpunk character's glowing hair clasps subtly pulse. Her lips part. A soft blue glow appears and fades near her eye. The zipper down her top pulses with blue light. The neon outline on her jacket flickers. The city lights in the background shift and blur, hinting at movement.
image_prompt: Full-body, high-angle portrait of a captivating cyberpunk young girl with light blue hair in glowing buns. She has Asian features, a subtle blue eye glow, and a black triangle under her eye. She wears a black "Cyberpunk" top with a glowing zipper, a blue/purple/black jacket with neon shoulder outlines, and a midriff-baring tribal tattoo. Her black mini-skirt has cloud patterns, and a blue belt with pouches. Blurred cyberpunk city background with subtle "AI" and "C29" overlay.
refined_video_prompt: Hair clasps subtly pulse with a soft glow. Lips part. A soft blue glow appears, then fades near her eye. Her zipper pulses with blue light. The jacket's neon outline flickers. Background city lights shift, blurring movement.
